item.title: Web Server vs App Server
item.description: Web Server Servers only web pages. Could be static or Dynamic pages Static Pages HTML CSS JavaScript(Interactively) Dynamic Pages JSP, Servlet (JAVA + HTML + CSS + JavaScript) PHP (PHP + HTML + CSS + JavaScript) ASP.NET (C# + HTML + CSS + JavaScript)
